edu.biu.scapi.primitives.dlog.groupParams

Class ECFpGroupParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.scapi.primitives.dlog.groupParams.GroupParams
      • edu.biu.scapi.primitives.dlog.groupParams.ECGroupParams
        • edu.biu.scapi.primitives.dlog.groupParams.ECFpGroupParams
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.security.spec.AlgorithmParameterSpec

    public class ECFpGroupParams
extends ECGroupParams
    This class holds the parameters of an Elliptic curve over Zp.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • ECFpGroupParams

        public ECFpGroupParams(java.math.BigInteger q,
               java.math.BigInteger xG,
               java.math.BigInteger yG,
               java.math.BigInteger p,
               java.math.BigInteger a,
               java.math.BigInteger b,
               java.math.BigInteger h)
        Sets the order, generator and coefficients parameters
        Parameters:
        q - group order
        xG - x coordinate of the generator point
        yG - y coordinate of the generator point
        p - group modulus
        a - the a coefficient of the elliptic curve equation
        b - the b coefficient of the elliptic curve equation
        h - the group cofactor
